Question.Subject: A couple questions about Twitter?
Question.Content: 1. Will I be charged by twitter on my phone from them sending me updates? 2. My number will not get out on the site will it? 3. Will I be able to cancel the mobile updates when I want?
Question.ChosenAnswer: 1. It depends on your carrier and plan. It is sent as a regular text with no charge extra than what you are normally charged for a text from out of network phones. 2. No 3. Yes

Answer.Content: 1. It depends on your carrier and plan. It is sent as a regular text with no charge extra than what you are normally charged for a text from out of network phones. 2. No 3. Yes

Q1. Will I be charged by twitter on my phone from them sending me updates?
A1: Depends, do you have unlimited text messaging with your cell provider, or do you pay for text messages? Twitter won't charge you, but a text message is a text message no matter who sends it, and your cell provider might/will/could..
Q2. My number will not get out on the site will it?
A2: NOTHING you give any site is 100% safe. Hackers hack for a reason. If they hack twitter, then yeah - it could happen.
Q3. Will I be able to cancel the mobile updates when I want?
A3: Yes.
